meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>examine</kanji> something too closely during your <kanji>inspection</kanji> you'll probably find a flaw and want to <vocabulary>censor</vocabulary> it. Put little black bars over all the flaws you find as you stare.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
